entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
